controller

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a connection between the user(client) and the the server Has methods that are used to communicate to the server Also processes and message from the server
    Author:
    Derian Davila Acuna

      • sendGameOver

                         Player player,
                         int enemiesKilled,
                         int towersBought)
        sends a gameover message to the other user
        Parameters:
        playerWon - - if you won then this is true otherwise this is false
        player - - the user's player class
        enemiesKilled - - how many enemies the player's killed
        towersBought - - how many towers the player's bought
